text: Kálmán Ihász (6 March 1941 – 31 January 2019) was a Hungarian footballer. During his club career he played for Vasas SC. For the Hungary national football team, he participated in the 1962 FIFA World Cup. He also won a gold medal in 1964 Summer Olympics. Ihász was born in Budapest. Ihász died on 31 January 2019 in Budapest from cerebral infarction, aged 77. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from cerebral infarction Category:Olympians for Hungary Category:Footballers from Budapest Category:Hungary at the 1962 FIFA World Cup Category:Hungary at the 1966 FIFA World Cup
title: Kálmán Ihász
